title: Hitori De Yoru Wa Koe Rarenai
alternative_title: I Can't Stand Another Night Alone ; ひとりで夜は越えられない ; Hitori de Yoru wa Koerarenai ; Can't Stay A Night Alone
status: I Can't Stand Another Night Alone ; ひとりで夜は越えられない ; Hitori de Yoru wa Koerarenai ; Can't Stay A Night Alone
description:
Description :
        1950s Japan. Ex-soldier, Seishirou, is working as a waiter in a cabaret near an American military base, passing his days in a stagnant cycle. One day, he is approached by Jim, an American soldier who speaks fluent Japanese. Seishirou is moved by Jim's soft smile, and Jim soon confesses his interest in him. Seishirou sees this as a chance to change his life."Shall we try doing this whole 'couple' thing together?"A tall, puppy-like American soldier x a traumatized Japanese ex-soldier.Storyteller Yoh Matsumoto's BL about redemption set in post-war Japan begins!
